description: A tagged file structure for multimedia resource files. Strictly speaking, RIFF is not a file format, but a file structure that defines a class of more specific file formats.
name: Resource Interchange File Format (RIFF)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
